00021  int SearchResultsModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex &parent) const
00022  {

00024         return m_results->num_results();
00025      else
00026          return 0;

00034  QVariant SearchResultsModel::data(const QModelIndex &index, int role) const
00035  {
00036     if (!m_results)
00037         return QVariant();
00038 
00039     if (!index.isValid())
00040         return QVariant();
00041 
00042     if (index.row() >= m_results->num_results())
00043         return QVariant();
00044 
00045     if (role == Qt::DisplayRole)
00046     {
00047         boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00048         switch (index.column())
00049         {
00050             case translation_column:
00051                 return translation->get_long_name().c_str();
00052             
00053             case book_column:
00054                 return translation->get_entry(m_results->at(index.row()))->get_book().c_str();
00055 
00056             case chapter_column:
00057                 return translation->get_entry(m_results->at(index.row()))->get_chapter();
00058 
00059             case verse_column:
00060                 return translation->get_entry(m_results->at(index.row()))->get_verse();
00061 
00062             case text_column:
00063                 return translation->get_entry(m_results->at(index.row()))->get_text().c_str();
00064             
00065             default:
00066                 return QVariant();
00067         }
00068     }
00069     else if (role == Qt::ToolTipRole)
00070     {
00071         boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation;
00072         switch (index.column())
00073         {
00074             case text_column:
00075                 translation = m_translation_manager->at(m_results->translation_at(index.row()));
00076                 return verse_collection_to_title_and_string_wrapped(translation->get_entry(m_results->at(index.row()), 2), translation).c_str();
00077             default:
00078                 return QVariant();
00079         }
00080     }
00081     else
00082     {
00083         return QVariant();
00084     }
00085  }
00086 
00087  QVariant SearchResultsModel::headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation,
00088                                          int role) const
00089  {
00090     if (role != Qt::DisplayRole)
00091         return QVariant();
00092 
00093     if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
00094         switch (section)
00095         {
00096             case translation_column:
00097                 return tr("Translation");
00098             
00099             case book_column:
00100                 return tr("Book");
00101 
00102             case chapter_column:
00103                 return tr("Chapter");
00104 
00105             case verse_column:
00106                 return tr("Verse");
00107 
00108             case text_column:
00109                 return tr("Text");
00110 
00111             default:
00112                 return QVariant();
00113         }
00114     else
00115         return QString("%1").arg(section);
00116  }
00117 
00118  boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay> SearchResultsModel::get_verse_display(const QModelIndex &index)
00119  {
00120      if (index.column() == text_column)
00121          return boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_results->translation_at(index.row()), m_results->at(index.row()), 2));
00122      else
00123          return boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>(new VerseDisplay(m_results->translation_at(index.row()), -1, -1));
00124  }
